DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine which type of food results in a shorter hospital stay and better overall outcome for babies born with gastroschisis.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical and Biological Outcomes of Human Milk and Formula Intake After Gastroschisis Repair
DOC.criteria: 1) neonates born with gastroschisis 2) neonatologist, surgeon, and parent (or care provider) willing to have the neonate participate in the study 1) associated anomaly or medical concern that impacts hospital length of stay (i.e. intestinal atresia, very low birth weight(<1500 grams)) 2) known major chromosomal abnormality
